analysis.description:
Delivery.airdropsTokens (/unique_chucks/13/0xe04ed83230374b51d17c96866fde24c0f99b6377.sol#162-205) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-amountToSendTotal.add(_vamounts[indexTest]) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe04ed83230374b51d17c96866fde24c0f99b6377.sol#174-177)
	-pecul.transfer(toAddress,amountTo_Send) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe04ed83230374b51d17c96866fde24c0f99b6377.sol#186-190)

Delivery.airdropsTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- pecul.transfer(toAddress,amountTo_Send) (/unique_chucks/13/0xe04ed83230374b51d17c96866fde24c0f99b6377.sol#186-190)

Reentrancy in Delivery.InitPeculiumAdress (/unique_chucks/13/0xe04ed83230374b51d17c96866fde24c0f99b6377.sol#152-162):
	External calls:
	- decimals = pecul.decimals() (/unique_chucks/13/0xe04ed83230374b51d17c96866fde24c0f99b6377.sol#158)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- initPecul (/unique_chucks/13/0xe04ed83230374b51d17c96866fde24c0f99b6377.sol#159-161)

Peculium.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/13/0xe04ed83230374b51d17c96866fde24c0f99b6377.sol#317)
